result.html: Bhuaigh mé an comórtasI won the competition.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuaiġ mé an comórtasI won the competition.

result.eng: The results of the competition will be announced tomorrow.
result.html: Fógrófar torthaí an chomórtais amárachThe results of the competition will be announced tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Fógrófar torṫaí an ċomórtais amáraċThe results of the competition will be announced tomorrow.

result.ga: Tá an comórtas ar siúl amárach
result.orig: Tá an comórtas ar siúl amárach
result.html: Tá an comórtas ar siúl amárachThe competition is on tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Tá an comórtas ar siúl amáraċThe competition is on tomorrow.

result.eng: The two businesses are in competition with each other.
result.ga: Tá an dá ghnólacht in iomaíocht le chéile
result.orig: Tá an dá ghnólacht in iomaíocht le chéile
result.html: Tá an dá ghnólacht in iomaíocht le chéileThe two businesses are in competition with each other.
result.ponchtml: Tá an dá ġnólaċt in iomaíoċt le ċéileThe two businesses are in competition with each other.

result.eng: But competition between the suppliers was fierce and the profits were narrow.
result.ga: Ach bhí an comórtas géar idir na soláthróirí agus bhí na brabaigh caol
result.orig: Ach bhí an comórtas géar idir na soláthróirí agus bhí na brabaigh caol
result.html: Ach bhí an comórtas géar idir na soláthróirí agus bhí na brabaigh caolBut competition between the suppliers was fierce and the profits were narrow.
result.ponchtml: Aċ ḃí an comórtas géar idir na soláṫróirí agus ḃí na brabaiġ caolBut competition between the suppliers was fierce and the profits were narrow.
